summary: This is an email chain regarding the drafting of a bail opposition document, likely related to an Epstein case proceeding. It involves a Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit in the Southern District of New York coordinating edits and deadlines with their team.

persons.name: Deputy Chief, Public Corruption Unit
persons.context: The sender of the email, likely from the Southern District of New York, coordinating the bail opposition draft and setting a deadline for Monday.

events.title: Bail Opposition Document Due
events.description: The bail opposition draft is due on Monday, November 8, 2021, as indicated in the email.

keyFacts: A bail opposition document was being drafted and reviewed by the Public Corruption Unit of the Southern District of New York.
The document was due on Monday, November 8, 2021.
The email indicates coordination within a legal team, with edits being submitted for review.
